summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Prem Rishi Fitness trainer website. Backend APIs working correctly with 88.9% success rate. Frontend fully functional with all features working including navigation, service cards, contact form, and mobile responsiveness.

minor_issues.issue: CORS headers not visible in OPTIONS response
minor_issues.impact: Minor - API calls work correctly despite missing CORS headers in OPTIONS

passed_tests: API root endpoint returns correct message
Contact form submission saves to database successfully
Contact form validation rejects invalid data
All 4 service options (weight-loss, strength-training, flexibility-rehab, nutrition-coaching) work
Homepage loads with Hero section and navigation
Hero section CTA buttons and scroll indicator present
Navigation smooth scroll works to Services and About sections
Services section displays all 4 service cards correctly
About section shows trainer credentials (NASM Certified, 5+ years, nutrition doctors)
Contact form displays all required fields (Name, Email, Phone, Service dropdown, Message)
Service dropdown shows all 4 service options
Contact form submission works end-to-end with success message
Mobile responsive navigation with hamburger menu works
